t: Irish Rovers - Collection - Amazon.com Music
s: I love this CD. But then I am a fan of theirs. This album is a collection of songs they have recorded over the years. I saw that one of my favorite Irish Rover songs, the "Unicorn" was on the album and was one of the reasons I bought the album. I thought the whole album was great.

t: Amazon.com: Unicorn [LP record]: CDs & Vinyl
s: As far as I'm concerned this is the definitive Irish Rovers album. If you like Irish folk music and haven't heard this album, then it is a must-have for you. Of course, if you owned a radio in the late '60's, you have almost certainly heard "The Unicorn", but there are many other songs on this ...
